original_title: Fire engulfs NOLIMIT outlet in Wellawatte
original_body_lines: Colombo, March 24 (Daily Mirror) - A fire was reported from the NOLIMIT Shopping Complex in Wellawatte a short while ago.
The fire quickly engulfed the premises, prompting an urgent response from the local Fire Brigade.
Accordingly, six fire engines rushed to the scene to douse the flames.
